title: Calories in 1 Cup Uncooked Rice
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 cup uncooked rice—about 675 kcal—plus carbs, protein, fat, per-100g nutrition, tweaks, and FAQs for better meal planning.
assumptions: Long-grain white rice, uncooked; 1 US cup ≈ 185 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice type (e.g., white, brown), brand, grain length, and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 cup uncooked white rice provides ~675 kcal and 148 g carbs.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp vegetable oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup uncooked rice?
faqs.a: Approximately 675 kcal for long-grain white rice.

faqs.q: How much does 1 cup uncooked rice weigh?
faqs.a: About 185 grams for long-grain white rice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 1 cup uncooked rice?
How much protein is in 1 cup uncooked rice?
Do calories change when rice is cooked?
faqs.a: No, calories remain ~675, but 1 cup uncooked yields about 3 cups cooked.
